betterquesting:10.desc:8:
With the power of the §5§onether star§,, combined with §rthe materials from the aether, a new kind of §d§orift§r can be ripped open, different from the kinds you may have seen before. Indeed, our next destination is a dark, eerie realm, mostly untouched by the §6§l§oDimensional Shift§r. Hopefully, we can find out why this is the case.

     Also, do keep in mind before you try crossing over - forcing a §d§orift§r open will only work upon obsidian, or some stone native to the §5§omidnight §rrealm.
